name: Usual John
description:
Usual John is a retro action shooter, a classic adventure, with simple gameplay that will allow you to completely immerse yourself in the world of old Dandy and NES games. The game contains several different locations and many kinds of enemies, each has its own abilities and characteristics.

The scene is an usual city of the usual year, where you have to get used to the role of usual John. You together with the hero will live the usual day for him among the zombie apocalypse. Immerse yourself in this world, familiar to the protagonist, but absolutely unfamiliar to you world, fight with hordes of zombies and other evil spirits and defeat the terrible creature in order to save your life.

The classic retro-look of Usual John and the appropriate soundtrack will allow you to plunge into nostalgic feelings.

Features:
  • Dinamic levels
  • Intraining battles with bosses
  • Excellent soundtrack
  • Juicy Art
